Name: rngsubtype
Description: OID of the element type (subtype) of this range type

Name: rngcollation
Description: OID of the collation used for range comparisons, or 0 if\nnone

Name: rngsubopc
Description: OID of the subtype's operator class used for range\ncomparisons

Name: rngcanonical
Description: OID of the function to convert a range value into canonical\nform, or 0 if none

Name: rngsubdiff
Description: OID of the function to return the difference between two\nelement values as double precision, or 0 if none
